testcase.name: Login to Application
testcase.system-out: Given I am on MRS Login Page................................................passed When I enter "Admin" and "Admin123" for username and Password...............passed And Select any Location for the session.....................................passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then Login should be successful.............................................passed

testcase.name: Register Patient
testcase.system-out: Given I am on MRS Home Page.................................................passed When I click on Register for a patient......................................passed Then Register Patient Page must be displayed................................passed

testcase.name: Provide address of the patient
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Address Screen................................................passed When I give the address of the patient......................................passed And Click on Next...........................................................passed Then Phone Number Screen must be displayed..................................passed

testcase.name: Provide Phone number of the patient
Find Patient
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Home Page.....................................................passed When I click on Find Patient Record.........................................passed Then Find Patient Record Page must be displayed.............................passed

testcase.name: View Patient
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Find Patient Record Page......................................passed When I Search by Name.......................................................passed Then Patients record should be displayed with correct info..................passed
